CustomField.description: Used to determine how many future days timesheets are visible in the Employee Community. For example a value of 10 will mean timesheets with a start date of 10 days greater than today will be available in the community. If left blank or 0 the start date will default to today so that only the current time period is visible.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to determine how many future days timesheets are visible in the Employee Community. For example a value of 10 will mean timesheets with a start date of 10 days greater than today will be available in the community. If left blank or 0 the start date will default to today so that only the current time period is visible.
CustomField.label: No. Days Future Timesheets Visible
